purpose: How to expand shorthand to explicit canonical hands (169 classes -> 1326 combos)
rules: Offsuit: 'KTo+' expands KTo,KJo,KQo,KAo etc (higher offsuit combos in lexicographic order).
Single entries like 'AJs' or 'JTs' represent that canonical hand class.
When parser expands into concrete combos for simulation, use 4 combos for suited (AhKh, AsKs etc) and 12 for offsuit.
If a key maps to 'limp', treat it as a candidate SB limp; generator may convert limp->raise according to meta rules.
note: Use the provided tools/expandRanges.ts to reliably expand shorthand at runtime.
